alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Latimer; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Haskell, northwestern Latimer and central Pittsburg Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 430 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles east of Arrowhead State Park to 4 miles west of Mcalester Regional Airport. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Hartshorne... Krebs... Quinton... Alderson... Kinta... Blocker... Robbers Cave State Park... Mcalester Regional Airport... Haileyville... Gowen... Dow... Bache... Featherston... Lewisville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
